usage:
1. install erlang OTP laocally;
2. in this directory:
   compile:
   erlc parse_account.erl
   
run:
1> parse_account:decode_account("0000011319353459011000000000020000080403001305102808301308040804123456123456192165102801").
{bank_transaction,"0000011319353459","011000",
                  "000000020000","0804030013","051028","083013","0804","0804",
                  "123456","192165102801"}				  
2> parse_account:decode_account("0000011319353459011000000000040000080403001305102808301308040804123456123456192165102801").
{bank_transaction,"0000011319353459","011000",
                  "000000040000","0804030013","051028","083013","0804","0804",
                  "123456","192165102801"}				  
3> parse_account:decode_account("0000011319353459011000000000060010080403001305102808301308040804123456123456192165102801").
{bank_transaction,"0000011319353459","011000",
                  "000000060010","0804030013","051028","083013","0804","0804",
                  "123456","192165102801"}
4> parse_account:decode_account("0000011319353459011000000000010000080403001305102808301308040804123456123456192165102801").
{bank_transaction,"0000011319353459","011000",
                  "000000010000","0804030013","051028","083013","0804","0804",
                  "123456","192165102801"}
5> parse_account:decode_account("000001131935345901100000010000080403001305102808301308040804123456123456192165102801").
{bank_transaction,"0000011319353459","011000",
                  "000100000804","0300130510","280830","130804","0804",
                  undefined,"123456","192165102801"}
6> parse_account:decode_account("1224343232423423423243242342342342342342343423423423434234234234234").
{error,"input format error!"}
